maml:description.maml:para: Adds ssl certificate to application gateway
The Add-AzureApplicationGatewaySslCertificate cmdlet adds the ssl certificate to an application gateway
Name of ssl certificate that is being added
Name of ssl certificate that is being added
The Get-AzureApplicationGateway cmdlet gets the existing application gateway.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get application gateway object which can be piped to other application gateway cmdlets.
Prints the complete list of application gateways under a subscription

maml:description.maml:para: The Get-AzureApplicationGatewaySslCertificate cmdlet returns ssl certificate

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get the complete list of ssl certificates installed in application gateway

maml:description.maml:para: The Get-AzureApplicationGatewayConfig cmdlet returns application gateway configuration context which comprises of configuration object as well as XML configuration.
Optional parameter to save the configuration in XML format at the input location
Optional parameter to save the configuration in XML format at the input location
The New-AzureApplicationGateway creates new application gateway.
Name of virtual network application gateway should be deployed in
List of subnets application gateway should be deployed in
Name of virtual network application gateway should be deployed in
List of subnets application gateway should be deployed in
The Remove-AzureApplicationGateway cmdlet removes application gateway
Removes ssl certificate from application gateway
The Remove-AzureApplicationGatewaySslCertificate cmdlet removes ssl certificate from application gateway
Name of application gateway ssl certificate is being removed from
Name ssl certificate that is being removed
Name of application gateway ssl certificate is being removed from
Name ssl certificate that is being removed
The Set-AzureApplicationGatewayConfig sets the configuration of application gateway
Location of application gateway configuration file in XML format
Location of application gateway configuration file in XML format

dev:remarks.maml:para: Setting configuration using application gateway configuration object
Setting configuration using using configuration file

maml:description.maml:para: The Start-AzureApplicationGateway cmdlet starts application gateway
Name of application gateway to be stopped
Name of application gateway to be stopped
The Stop-AzureApplicationGateway cmdlet stops application gateway
The Update-AzureApplicationGateway updates existing application gateway
Name of of virtual network application gateway should be deployed in
List of subnets application gateway should be deployed in
Name of of virtual network application gateway should be deployed in
List of subnets application gateway should be deployed in

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updating application gateway with mandatory parameters

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Update-AzureApplicationGateway -Name <gateway name> -VnetName <Vnet Name> -Subnets @("subnet1", "subnet2") -InstanceCount 2 -GatewaySize small -Description "Updated application gateway"

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updating application gateway with all mandatory and optional parameters
